SRP.Q: On Nova Broadcast, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1959 relative to that in 1962 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Nova Broadcast, the data point in 1959 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1962.

VA.Q: Perform the Douglas-Peucker algorithm to simplify the line representing the Oracle Stream. List the x-coordinates of data points to be preserved.(8 points need to be provided)
VA.A: The x-coordinates of the data points to be preserved are: {1953, 1954, 1957, 1959, 1962, 1964, 1967, 1968}.
